definitions.text: a light within the field of vision that is brighter than the brightness to which the eyes are adapted

examples: he enjoyed being in the limelight
when Congress investigates it brings the full glare of publicity to the agency

definitions.text: look at with a fixed gaze
examples: The girl glared at the man who tried to make a pass at her
The moon glared back at itself from the lake's surface
The sun glared down on us
